mcq.statement: Who were the three great Sultans of the Slave Dynasty era?

options.a: Qutb-ud-din Aibak, Shams-ud-din Iltutmush, and Ghiyas-ud-din Balban
options.b: Alauddin Khilji, Muhammad bin Tughlaq, Firoz Shah Tughlaq

mcq.one_liner: The three great Sultans of the Slave Dynasty era were **Qutb-ud-din Aibak, Shams-ud-din Iltutmush, and Ghiyas-ud-din Balban**.
